turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Main St. in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will this order be for pickup or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Caramel Brulee Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What milk would you like it to have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Skim milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any other types of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like sprinkles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a straw?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it to be moderately hot or scalding hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Scalding hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I have an order for a venti Caramel Brulee Latte with sprinkles and no straw. Will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is $12. It will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device.
